page.title: 03AKEMAN STREET FARM (2)
page.content: They have no animals on the farm it just produces crops. Mr Green's grandfather employed 24 men and now Mr Green employes 6 men and they produce more. Mr Green gets up at 6:30 and starts work at 7:30. He works untill around 9:00 when he stops for 15 minutes. He starts work again at 9:15 and stops at 12:00 for thirty minutes for lunch. After lunch he works till 5:00. Akeman street farm have two combines, eight tractors, two fork lift trucks and two cropsprayers. The cropsprayers have got thin wheels so they don't crush the crops . The tractors cost 1500 pounds each. The combines cost 3500 pounds each.
